commentList.translatedContent:
Breakfast is very good Diverse choice suitable for international travelers
The location is quiet and there are shopping malls nearby, very comfortable
There is also a laundry room and a gym in the hotel
Is a good choice for accommodation

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. One personâ€™s nine-to-five is not as good as a group of peopleâ€™s fun field. I hope that the hotelâ€™s rich and powerful shared living room will bring you more beautiful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.translatedContent: Very low cost performance. Will not choose anymore. The room is very small, two steps into the door to the bed. This price is matched with 0 service, which is not worth it. The soundproofing is particularly bad, basically the sound in the corridor can be heard in the room. The only thing is the location is good. The breakfast is average, not worth the price. Will not choose again next time.

I stayed at the hotel again in April when the catkins were flying, and I once again sighed at the excellent location of the hotel and it was so convenient to travel. The environment is clean and tidy, and the service is meticulous and patient. See you at the end of the year~

The location of the hotel is very good, next to the Sanyuanqiao subway station, and Fenghuanghui shopping mall. If you come alone, if you donâ€™t pay attention to the size of the room, you can feel safer in a small room alone, and stay lazily. It is very comfortable to live in bed all day long. There are robots for takeaways. The hotel in this price range has its own building and lobby at this location, which is very good, although not very big. But the cafe on the first floor is pretty good.

commentList.translatedContent: The location is very convenient, just two or three minutes walk from the subway Sanyuanqiao station. The bedding is very comfortable and the breakfast is good. By twelve o'clock it is really the favorite of lazy stars. Mom no longer has to worry that I will not be able to eat breakfast. One thing Iâ€™m not satisfied with is that the linen will fly some white dust and stick to the hair. I donâ€™t know if itâ€™s the quilt or the towel. I have encountered this problem before living in Xiâ€™an Huange. I hope it can be improved!

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. In CitiGO, the breakfast buffet is long standby from 7:00-12:00, so you donâ€™t have to worry about choosing between sleeping in and eating breakfast. Every night from 22:00-23:00, the restaurant provides free supper to warm the body and mind. Everything is just for you to enjoy more intimate care, and sincerely look forward to your staying again!

commentList.translatedContent:
As a business person who travels frequently, I really appreciate the style of this hotel. Simple, strong sense of science and technology, first of all, the whole check-in is very convenient, you can also send it by robot if you want to take it. The configuration in the room is quite complete, and the hot water is very convenient. Sound insulation is very good. It is only 200m away from Sanyuanqiao Metro Station, so transportation is very convenient.
By the way, little egg: There are six bottles of drinks in the mini bar every day for free, and the hotel provides free supper from 10pm to 11pm.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: You donâ€™t need a room card to open the door, and you donâ€™t need a remote control to watch TV. Even the air conditioner, lights, and curtains can be controlled by mobile phones. We hope that living in CitiGO is a "cool" thing. Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO, and we look forward to your staying again!

commentList.translatedContent: Front desk service is very good

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide more attentive service for each guest, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: This hotel is booked for a business trip. The location of the hotel is very good, very close to Sanyuanqiao subway station. There is Phoenix Mall in the surrounding area, so eating and shopping are not a problem. The hotel facilities are also good, with a free laundry room + dryer, and a gym. The breakfast is very rich, and there is a free supper every night from 10-11. Order the takeaway and the robot will help deliver it upstairs. I will still book this hotel when I participate in exhibitions at the National Exhibition in the future! !

commentList.translatedContent: The overall environment is good, the service is good, the robots are cute, there is no breakfast, there are many and good restaurants around, and the subway is super convenient! That is, the room is too small, so you can go to the Kang when you enter the room.

commentList.translatedContent:
The temperature is 24 degrees, during the day, the room is 27 degrees, but there is no air conditioning, only heating. It is not flexible enough to cope with the current weather changes and is sloppy. It's been hot for 5 nights. The room faces west. In fact, as long as you switch to the east room, the problem will be solved, but it is not accepted. Speechless.
The room is really small.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: I'm sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. CitiGO values every guest's comments and suggestions. Thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better experience for everyone.

commentList.translatedContent:
Full details
Toothpaste to bedding, shower
Very long breakfast time

The most pleasant surprise is washing and drying

The room is indeed small, but the space on the first floor meets the design of entertainment work

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. CitiGO is a luxury and social brand of China Lodging Hotels Group. We are committed to making bathing and sleeping the best. From bathing facilities to mattresses, we use internationally renowned brands. The rooms are just for rest. The rest of the time is given to our public areas, where the strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more friends with similar interests and join the carnival. All CitiGO employees look forward to your next visit!

commentList.translatedContent: Relatively bad check-in experience. I have stayed at Huange Hotel many times before, which is quite reliable. This time the window sill next to the bed was full of dust, and the quilt was too dirty to rub against it. Wiping dust is the easiest surface job, and it is hard to imagine more invisible sanitation. I applied for a delay, the front desk agreed and said it was processed. However, the door card failed several times due to the time limit and was repeatedly reset. Halfway through sleep, he was urged to leave by phone. . . By the way, the iron frame of the mobile phone on the window sill is also broken. It hangs down and knocks when it turns over.

The location is not bad, itâ€™s quite close to the Phoenix Hui, the room has basic equipment, no hangers (there is no Chinese prompt on the front of the bottle for shampoo, bath and conditioner). You can only follow the instructions on the back of the bottle. Judging, the toothbrush needs to be taken by yourself, and the toothbrush is divided into soft and hard bristles.
I have to say that the breakfast is quite rich, Chinese and Western buffets are combined, I still hope that the breakfast butter can be replaced with low-salt! !
Individual staff at the front desk lacked rigorous details about the service. They asked if there were no charges for on-demand programs, but the answer was that there are paid and free programs. Please pay attention to it. This does not mean that there is no answer to understand. It is given to the front desk on 9.12 in the evening. No one answered the phone~

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: CitiGO values the comments and suggestions put forward by every guest, thank you for your trust and correction. We will continue to reflect and improve to create a better experience for everyone.

commentList.translatedContent: Too bad, too bad, Iâ€™ve never seen such a bad hotel service. The front desk and service staff are setting up and asking something. After half an hour, there is no response, and then you ask him again, saying that there is no way to get it for you. You have no long-term contact. Shall we inform? Only robots work, you have to go downstairs to get everything yourself. You have to get a cup by yourself, the robot is not free, are your service staff just idle? The TV canâ€™t connect to the screen mirroring, I found a technician to come and do it for ten minutes, I said Iâ€™m sorry, I canâ€™t, and the red light on the socket in the room is blinking, blinding your eyes, is it killing me? Is it the first curse in 2021? I gave it to this rubbish hotel for the New Yearâ€™s Eve, not to add to the congestion. I gave it to a TV picture with occasional disconnection in the middle.

commentList.translatedContent: Booked a hotel for three nights! The hotel front desk called me the next day and asked if I would renew! Was still sleeping! Very annoyed! The most basic hotel services in hotel management. Your front desk will not type guest information into the computer to check it. Are you sure? Need to call the guests in the morning to wake me up! That's all! The hotel cannot smoke. I went downstairs to smoke! Then they found the room card and they only did it for me for one day! When I checked in on the first day, I told the front desk that I had booked three nights! When I made the room card, I told the front desk to directly apply my room card to the day that my hotel reservation ends! Dandan at the front desk is still a manager! She said it herself.... The reason given to me is that you, sir, booked the hotel separately one night and one night! So I can only give you a room card day by day! ! ! What is the reason for this? I have stayed in so many hotels! There is no hotel like this. I always book one night after another! I said that when I checked in yesterday, I told you that I had booked for three nights. Why did you call me today to make me sleep! I have a nervous breakdown! Especially afraid of the hotel's early call! I can't fall asleep after being woken up! When I questioned the manager Dandan at the front desk, she did not apologize at all... and told me that because your room was not booked for three consecutive nights, it was booked one night and one night, and we could not help you to make room for two consecutive days. card! This reason is absolutely perfect! I am learning hotel management! Your reason is really good ğŸ‘! Very good! Especially able to convince customers! The guests didn't even have a fire!

The room is too small, only one side of the bed can go up, so it's okay to live alone. No time for breakfast, it looks good, 69 people alone. Recommended for those who catch an early flight.

In addition to "sleep and bath", we encourage guests to give other time to the hotel public area. We will continue to work hard to improve on the basis of your suggestions and sincerely look forward to your understanding.

commentList.translatedContent: Good experience, good hotel facilities, compact and reasonable internal layout of the room, entertainment facilities and breakfast downstairs are also very good, convenient to travel, very close to the subway station line 13, suitable for travel to the airport, convenient, the only downside is that the room is a bit too small Yes, but you can still choose for business trips, very cost-effective

Very modern hotel, the door lights automatically turn on when the door is opened, the curtains automatically turn on, the breakfast is quite rich, the robot delivers the food after ordering, and there is free supper, a clean and fast hotel

commentList.translatedContent: Although the sparrow is small and well-equipped, I have to feel that Beijing is really expensive. The service attitude and robot delivery are very good. It is also close to the subway station. It is convenient to go everywhere. Maybe because the small air is not very good, turn on the air conditioning and improve

The breakfast is plentiful, and the breakfast time lasts until 12 oâ€™clock is also great ğŸ‘, there is a gym, the laundry room has a dryer, like it, the decoration is fresh and elegant and modern, the service staff is good, and you feel at home, the price is around 500, very Worth recommending and experiencing.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. CitiGO is personally written and designed by a well-known international designer to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent guest control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is located in the quiet side of a large shopping mall, 200 meters away from the subway, the rooms are clean with black technology, but slightly smaller, and there is no heating that will be available on November 1st, the robot delivery service is perfect! By the way, supper and delicious little chaos!

My wife and I travel freely. Fortunately, I stayed at the Huange Hotel. The hotel gave me an overall feeling. To be honest:
The hotel room design is creative, but many are not practical, especially the bed occupies nearly 1/2 of the area of the room. The room area was originally not large, so the area for people to move around is less and it feels very uncomfortable. Sanitation is good, hot water is good, air-conditioning is good, front desk service is also good. There is no place to put small things due to the activity space of the house. An extra bed is not possible; the hotel is well located, very close to the Sanyuanqiao Metro Station on Line 10.

The hotel is very close to the subway station in a straight line. It is necessary to go around, but it is also very close. The decoration style of the hotel is very special, the rooms are small but well equipped, and the drinks in the refrigerator are free to drink!

feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CitiGO. CitiGO is a luxury and social brand of China Lodging Hotels Group. We are committed to making bathing and sleeping to the extreme. From bathing facilities to mattresses, we use internationally renowned brands. The rooms are just rest. The rest of the time is given to our public area, where the strong social atmosphere will allow you to find more friends with similar interests and join the carnival. All CitiGO employees look forward to your next visit!

commentList.translatedContent: Good breakfast, many activities, convenient transportation, and very stylish room design. There is a laundry room, a gym, and an activity room in the lobby. The free midnight snack wonton did not eat, go again next time

Very stylish and futuristic hotel. Suitable for young people to travel, the laundry room and the gym are tall, 24 hours is too convenient, the breakfast from 7 to 12 is too powerful, the bar and billiards are all great. Will choose here next time!

commentList.translatedContent: There are many types of breakfast and delicious. We brought the kids. The bed is very convenient against the wall. The hotel is very close to the subway. There is Phoenix Mall nearby and not far from major attractions. There are also robots that can deliver takeout upstairs at night. There is also a free supper, in short, all kinds of convenience, I will choose here when I go to Beijing.

commentList.translatedContent:
Simply great, great service, great environment, great location,
It is very close to the Sanyuanqiao subway station and the nearby Phoenix Mall is convenient for shopping and eating!
There was a fat little brother at the front desk who looked like a supervisor. He gave us a lot of suggestions for eating, drinking, playing and having fun in Beijing. One-day and two-day travel guides, excellent! Only with such excellent staff can we have such a great hotel and service!
And robot delivery

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO's service! We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.translatedContent: I would complain about the real feelings of staying in, there is no falsehood! I took my baby to Beijing for a trip to Beijing. I went to the family room of the hotel that I had booked before. I saw that the room was decorated before placing the order, so I specifically called the hotel to ask if there is an air purifier. I only placed the order after I was told. After arriving at the hotel on October 1st, first go to the front desk to check in and pay the room fee. Before paying the money, check with the front desk again if there is an air purifier. I was told again that there is an air purifier! Okay, pay the money and move in! When I walked into the elevator, I smelled a pungent smell of decoration. The rooms in the corridor are bigger and bigger than expected! So I immediately asked about the air purifier, the house sweeper actually took a bottle of air freshener to spray, saying that their hotel does not have an air purifier! After I checked with the front desk, I told me that there was indeed no air purifier! ! ! Well, I was deceived. On the first night, I was awake at three in the middle of the night, with a sore throat and headache, and stayed up all night. The child kept shouting that his throat had a sore headache the next day, and his husband said that he was unwell. Online checking is one of the symptoms of excessive formaldehyde! When I checked in on the 1st, the child had two unexplained nosebleeds during the day on the 3rd and the night on the 5th. The child had never had a nosebleed before. As a mother, I am very worried now. I am worried that staying in a room with severely excessive formaldehyde for four days will have a great impact on the health of the child. The people in the next room also said the room smelled! I donâ€™t understand why people stay in the hotel if the formaldehyde exceeds the standard. The robot delivery and free supper in your hotel canâ€™t make up for the fatal flaw of excessive formaldehyde! In addition, I discovered that the hotel had reduced the price before I checked in. It was a hundred lower than when I checked in! Too unreliable! I advise consumers, please keep your eyes open for your health, and be sure to refer to the evaluation before placing an order. Don't be attracted by some of his house's fancy decorations like me, and ended up living in a room with a serious excess of formaldehyde, which eventually harmed your children! Be sure to refer to the evaluation before placing an order!

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guests, CitiGO is a hotel with a design style that is different from other traditional hotels. We also understand that you are used to the so-called large rooms of traditional hotels in the past. Regarding your review content, I hope you can comment rationally. The hotel has never stated that it provides air purifiers. For your special needs, the hotel orders air purifiers online on the night of your stay on the first day. Get the room, take screenshots of the order and put it in your room for monitoring. The hotel can confirm this matter with you at any time. The formaldehyde problem, the hotel has been open for more than a year, and many children have stayed in the holiday. No other parents have feedback on the formaldehyde problem, whether it exceeds the standard It can also stand the test of professional tools. If you think that your child's nosebleeds are due to the reason of staying in the hotel, you can go to the hospital for a physical examination. Any proof that can prove that the reason for staying in the hotel caused this matter, the hotel will be responsible to the end. ; Regarding the issue of price difference, the hotel did not charge any price difference for the family room you stayed in, and the big bed room you booked to change the high-priced room type for free. Ctrip also asked the hotel for free breakfast for you, and did not charge any fees. We understand that as a Parents love their children with great enthusiasm, but as the hotel, we will do our best to provide more value-added services beyond the standard of stay during your stay. We do not expect you to appreciate or treat the facts equally, but we also hope that you will not reverse the facts and comments. The hotel does not agree.

Check the video. When you checked in on the first day, the front desk said there was no purifier! I'm just honestly commenting, look at other people's comments, are there several that say it tastes good? Therefore, it doesn't matter how the hotel side quibble, other consumers have sharp eyes, you just keep getting darker and darker! Consumers will know whether there is a smell in hotel rooms and corridors. I believe that everyone loves children and themselves as much as I do, so please refer to the evaluation.

commentList.translatedContent:
Very good, the traffic location is really good, only about 200 meters away from the subway station, especially convenient to the airport!
The hotel is basically impeccable except for the small rooms. There is no drying rack, but there is a washing machine with dryer on the first floor. The details are in place, especially the shower curtain in the bathroom. It's a little bit like a dojo in a screw shell, after all, the Imperial Capital House is precious. Will stay next time.

feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, hello: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO. German showers, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, down bedding... In terms of sleep and bathing, CitiGO always adheres to high quality standards. We will continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences and look forward to your staying again!

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
